category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 13 (Industrial Safety Guarantee)
contents: Article 13 (Industrial Safety Guarantee) ① The Sports Association provides a safe and hygienic working environment for employees, guarantees the right to safety, and takes action in accordance with related laws such as the Occupational Safety and Health Act for accidents or diseases that occur in the workplace. do. ② The Sports Association creates a system and environment that guarantees the safety of all athletes, employees of the Sports Association and related organizations, and stakeholders when carrying out prescribed business. [Moved from Article 8, previous Article 13 moved to Article 8 2019 11. 7.]
